Subskills.name: Hellflame Bullets
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by bullet hell.

Subskills.name: More Bullets
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of projectiles fired by bullet hell.

Subskills.name: Bullet Storm
Subskills.description: Fire bullets into all directions with reduced travel distance.

Subskills.name: Slipping Triggerfinger
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to fire an additional wave of bullets.

Subskills.name: Steady Gunhold
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using bullet hell.

Subskills.name: Heavy Bullet Impact
Subskills.description: Chance to knock monsters back on hit stunning them.

Subskills.name: Higher Caliber
Subskills.description: Increases the size of bullet hell projectiles.

Subskills.name: Gunpowder
Subskills.description: Bullets knock monsters back with increased power dealing increased damage and stunning monsters when they collide with terrain.

Subskills.name: Blasting Gunshot
Subskills.description: Increases critical strike damage when using bullet hell.

Subskills.name: Fragging Rounds
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to unleash an explosion dealing area of effect damage.

Subskills.name: Abusive Tactics
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Nowhere to Hide
Subskills.description: Fire additional projectiles in a wider radius.
